author: mmusich
body:
Summary of the proposed changes:
   * fixed a bug in the logic of the `SiStripApvGainsRatioMaxDeviationWithPreviousIOVTrackerMap` class
   * added back summaries of average gains per barrel layer and endcap disk (stashed at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/19193/commits/d29497908ea5453cb7a24c93ce40743d1923a223) profiting of the newly added class `StandaloneTrackerTopology`
   * added 2D Histograms of gains vs layer (by @jozzez1)
   * added several comparison plots between IOVs and summary by partition for the `SiStripApvGain` object
   * added summary by region for the `SiStripDetVOff`
   * added Payload Inspector for `SiStripBadStrip` object
title: [93X] several updates for the SiStrip Payload Inspector classes
